string.text: What do you want?
I need to get to Lucash.
Take away our gun and don't even think to draw it, otherwise I'll shoot you.
You can pass, but don't think to draw your weapon - or you'll lose your thinking cap.
Thanks.
Ok.
Hello.
Yeah.
Pard'n me?
Okay, well...
Scoffing, aren't you?
Oh! It's you, ciao!
Greetz.
It's been a long time we haven't seen each other...
And have we met before?
Err... Well... Heh...
To tell the truth I haven't seen you before.
Hmm... Good enough.
What kind of a place is that?
Place... yeah, not a bad place, I guess...
Be more specific?
Ha... bizarre questions... hehe...
But yet?
Hey... calm down. Now well... fine place it is. Peaceful enough. Everything is a-ok. Yeah... You calm down. Don't be in rush.
And who are you, all and all?
Talkin' of me?
Not of me, I guess.
Me. Well me. I make food here... Yeah. Kinda cook, master of knife and flavouring... Some greens, grass in general. Bread, meat, cheese - clear?
Pretty clear.
Tinned goods... condensed milk, tinned stew, heh, bulls in tomatoes... hehe.
I understand.
Lond beafs... ketchup... eggs... bread... beaf... cheese. Well you know. Sausages, wurst, game...
OKAY! I got it! What's your name, and all?

Hmm... Yeah! Slavik is my name... this is for the label... No! For the apron... I've got a white apron... Yeah, well... You sit down... Don't loom up here... Heh... Else you can be shot by the sniper, you know... heh... ahem...
There is a village nearby, isn't it?
Well.
Well what?
Hem?
Village.
Oh well... Yes, there is a village. Foodstuffs and all... condensed milk...
How can I get there?
Hmm. Let me think... Aha... Do you really need it? Calm down... Sit here... Lets have a smoke, eh?
I need to get to the village.
Okay... lets have a smoke, sit... everything is kewl, yeah... I'll take you there. That's not a matter.
I don't need it. Just show me the way to get there.
Aha... Nonono... You're setting tasks... Well we'll get there together well. Lets have a sit here for a while...
Listen here do you have a clue where I can come by equipment?
Equipment? More codes...
Yes, equipment. Weapons? Maybe artifacts?
Weapons... nope... my knife... Wanna have a knife? Well. Artifacts. And what for? Don't strain yourself. Sit here. Lets have a smoke. And talk... about artifacts...
Where can I find artifacts in the neighborhood?

No problem. Do you know where the radioactive swamp is? No? Doesn't matter. There. I mean artifacts. There they are.\nWhile don't you make fuss. Don't exert myself. Hem? Artifacts... heg... artifacts-artifacts...
Okay. Goodbye.
Ahem... sit down, you.
I'm leaving.
Eh? No problem... calm down... Yeah? Close the door after me... I'm leaving...
Hey, sit down... lets sit...
Lets have a drink, eh?
No problem, bro. Fill my one somewhat quicker.
Take it. ...ah, have a shot!
Gulp, gulp... eh! Take the bottle... there is something left inside.
Well what, maybe another shot?
Guuulp... as if on high!!! Eh, the bottle is out. Got another one?
Let me see.
Yeah, here! Take another shot.
Guulp... gulp, gulp, gulp... What a master you are, that's done it, another bottle. Have you got a stock or else?
Well... er... you drink it, drink. Hic... it's been a long time I haven't drunk anything.
For our victory!!! Really. Guuulp... yeeee oooh...
Yeah... for our victory!
...gimme more... got any, eh?
Let me see...
Hic... last one, cos I can't handle it hic... more
Give it hic... here! Gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp, gulp...
Oh, go on with you... you've finished it yourself, for goodness' sake...
Hic... eee... well... hic.. well... hic...
I've heard that Freedom grouping has got RG-6 in its possession, I really feel like looking at this thing. I would buy it but noone is selling it, actually
What? What are you getting at, bro? You want me simply to give you away all the secrets of Freedom??? Whom do you think I am?
Hey, hey. I didn't expected such gravity. No means no, I got that.
That's as it may be, you shouldn't sniff about RG5 here and there. And who are you supposed to be, huh? I see you for the first time, and you're bothering me with such questions.
Come on, I was just asking.
Be more careful with these, you got it?
Clear enough.
I... hic... have heard that... hic... you had got that PG-6... I long for taking a quick look at it, I really want... huh? just to catch a glimpse.
Whaaat? …oh …so... visit that... what was it... damn, I forgot... What were you asking for?
A quick look at RG-6.
Nope, that RG-6... you can't, maybe you could something else, only for you... well, yeah. But you can't look at RG-6.
Well okay... I was... err... just asking.
…hic … RG-6, huh?
What? errr... Ah! Well those bozos... in the village... we had only two of them... but they've wasted it in the village... that's it…
Yes, what kind of... jerks. [knocks out]
Hi. Whatcha doing?
I've bumped off your sniper fella, as well as Lucash.
Wow, what a knockout! Take your prize :)

Well we want to punish that big boss from "Freedom" for murdering our guy. What a bedlam.\nIf you want to earn something, eliminate sniper on the tower, cos we've got sniper rifle broken. Right in time, damn it.
OK. I'll do that.
Waiting.
I'll think it over.
Okay, thinker.
No, I don't want to. Besides my gun is playing tricks with me.
Well, why a hell are you wandering the Zone?
I'm done with him already :)
Well, you're the man. Take the reqard for your righteous toils.
Done with him already.
Well, bro, you did a good turn, thanks. Take the reward and remember - you'll be a welcomed guest within our grouping.
I've thought it over.
And what did you hit upon?
I'll think some more.
What a slow-wit.
Probably not.
Then get a hell out of here.
OK. I'll put him down.
OK.
I've shot him.
OK. There is you money.
Always welcome.
Sure.
I just can't put this guy away.
Weekly, though. Maybe you'll try again?
Okay, I'll have a go.
Try to hurry up then.
Damn him at all.
As you wish.
Whatcha need?
A question arises
Move, move out. I don't do charity on Fridays.
I've been thinking and thinking and finally hit upon. Hit your lad down.
Strange way of thinking you've got. Well okay, here is your reward.
Always welcome.
I'll consider that :)
How wa the hunt?
Could be worse.
What will you do next?
Get back to "Rostok". Visit us when you have time.
Well, sniper isn't bumped off, but Lucash...
You've put down Lucash?!! Wow, amazing! Thanks, bro.
Hi, stalker, new here? I haven't seen you before. For how much time have you been included?
Included?
Me? Flimflam... well I... well everyone knows me... and er I knew the Gunslinger himself..
With the Gunslinger, how curious, have you been croaking grey-colored bloodsuckers together?
Go on with you.
Well and how does it look like?
Who, bloodsucker?
GUNSLINGER!
Helthy big fellow, 2 meters or above, the same in the shoulders, ugly like hell, looks like a boxer, with the touch of Asia.
With the touch of Asia?
Well yeah, he's got slanting eyes you know. And the scar all over the face.. That's it.
Clear. Tata then, warrior.
Well, usually people exclude from the Zone, and we've got vise versa, ahem, in Zone. You got it?
Got it. No, I'm newbee in here. And you?

Oh! I've been here for so long. I may say from the very beginning. There was nothing at the start - not a single grouping, no militaries - only the monsters and me. Quite a number perished by my hand... well... hands. Remember myself fighting with TEN bloodsuckers at once!!!
With ten? Well-well.

Don't you believe me? This was at night - nothing visible, only the eyes shining and the wind blowing... yeah... there were heavy rains as well that day. Suddenly that bloodsuckery beast pokes out and leaps on me, I burst him, then the second one, I give the other one, and the third one - I continue shooting, but my shotgun is stuck...
Shotgun stuck? Weren't you supposed to be shooting a burst.

Don't interrupt me when I'm talking, the forth one - I beat him with the riflebutt, suddenly I notice being held by the leg, that was another small and greycolored one - stalked me, what a bitch, I thought it had been the end of my existence...
Small and grey-colored!??? What kind of flimdy-flam is that...
Well, well, who is that?
It seems that you require help?
You are right to the very distraction. There is always a possibility to work for risky guy. Such as yourself, am I right?
That depends a good deal on what do I have to do.
The deal is actually the most habitual one. There is the main breeder of those freedoOmed scumbags over the hill, which my fellows and I are going to ravage, but...
But what?
But there is a tiny problem. As the entrance to the base is heavily guarded, and we have decided without using extra noddle to create another one, but...
But?

I've sent one of my guys to blow up the fence. But either it was for a good sniper or it was just an unlucky day, well he was done in. So the explosives are now set on the fence, nonetheless we can't manage to blow it up.
Why?
I don't want to send guy to direct my guys under the firing of that geek, but you're quite sufficient to blow him away. He won't start firing at you at once. What will you say?
What will my share be?

This is the correct approach to the case. You'll get 2500 from us and a lots of equipment on the base - there should be a lot of corpses, I promise you. You'll both help us and will remain satisfied. So what?
I'm ready. I'll report you on when I'm done with that fellow.
Keep it up.
I'd like to have a look at him, then I'll give you the answer, right?
Right. We'll be waiting, but not for long.
That's how there are now three dorks less in the world. And you appeared right on time, haven't given us away and stayed safe. I assume that noone is going to discover that, isn't it?
Yeah, neither do I.
Precious. Got any desire to earn money?
Always.
Well, follow us then, you'll talk to our commander.
Commander?
Yeah. Scull - he'll tell you everything himself.
OK.
Speak, stalker.
Need any help?
Additional gun is never spare.
How are you doing?
I'll tell you the truth - badly. Something is going on in the center of the Zone, monsters are crowding out there. We've lost two more guys recently, so you're just in time. Trembling?
Now way. I'm not a boy though. So to say - "Good monster - dead monster".

That's correct. Okay, not damn straight to the point. Scout returned and told that he haven't seen that amount of monsters even in dreams, he couldn't even tot them up. So it'll be really hot in here next night.
Monsters are not as dreadful as humans...

You're right. Even though we'll have to encounter humans, if those can be treated as the ones. Monolithians groups are attempting to break through time to time. I hope they won't be here with the monsters.
Where is my location supposed to be?
Camp somewhere behind the barricade, but don't poke out forward, cos there are too many bullets per square meter, you may get into the cross-fire. Is the task clear?
Got it!
I look forward to seeing you alive in the morning. And don't go too far, or you'll be considered as the deserter. With all the ensuing consequences... Dismissed.
Pick up the location for thee, otherwise you won't have time during the combat.
Every one's dead or there will be others?
It seems that everyone. As to me, it's enough for today. Thanks for help. Here, take these money - they may come in handy.
Good luck to ye...
Thanks, I'll need it.
I'm listening to you, stalker.
I've been sent by Lucash to provide help.
O, a recruit! How appropriate! A spare gun is never out of place.
Where can I take the shells, cos I'm running out of them.
I've got ammunition for AK and LR. Which one you require?
For AK.
Take these.
For LR.
Take it.
Give me all you've got!
Drop your cheeks.
Oh well these won't fit my gun.
Hem, we've got nothing more.
What kind of place is that at all?
We call it "Barrier". And actually it is the one. This is the last remaining civilized armypost in the Zone, buffer between humans and feral territory.
And what is farther?

Only the death is farther. Well or the lot to "serve monolith" - My monolith! In your name! Bla - bla - bla. In short I wouldn't advise you to go there. Well that's why we're playing in the host of Light - preventing the forces of the dark invade the Zone. And moreover detain reckless adventurers, at least warn them not to poke into there.
What do you need this for? You could withdraw, instead of risking every day for the sake of the others.

Who else if not we? Duty? Well they are truly experts concerning the expermination, crusification and dispatching the monsters. But they will never do anything for the others, can you see them here? No? Me too. Strange... Moreover we don't set aim to extirpate the creatures inhabiting the Zone, while we realize the necessity of the barrier - line which shouldn't be stepped over by neither side, otherwise it may lead to unpredictable consequences.
Like what?
Unpredictable. I said.
Stand right there. The access to the arsenal is allowed only for the members of the grouping.
Well, this is it. Now you can enter arsenal with us. But there is a slight problem...
Again? And what has happened?
Don't be frightned, there's nothing scary. Just the lock is stuck. hehe. If you need it urgently, shoot it off to the hell, I'll put the new one later.
Clear.
And how did you, stalker, trapped into this place, take yourself out of here quickly until it's too late.
Oh, so you can stay, and I can't?

Whether you think that we're here on our own will? Lucash is a scumbag, he sent us there, said that soldiers disappear in the village, he says, that it has to be cleared up. He is the one that ought to go and clarify this.
And what is happening here?
A hell knows. Some beast appeared here, or even several of them. That's how we got here.\n
So you don't even know yourself?
That's it. If we find it, the half of stuff is yours!!
Big hunt!!! I love it! Lead the way!
Well give me another, I'm scared.
As you like...
Hi, stalker. What do you need?
I'm here on business.
And what kind of business do you have?
See the world, show myself...
Well, then move on and show.

The group of Duty has dispatched your patrol on the road to "Rostok". And to all appearances are going to visit us. And I don't actually like the order within the Duty and I've decided to notify you. They've camped at the farm, between the base and the road to "Rostok". Eight persons, heavily armed.

Damn. Those get-goats are not going to leave it. Okay, then we'll have to punish them. Well, stalker, help us and we'll be grateful to you. Go to Max, he's like a corporal in here, he gathers the team and you'll dig those goats out.
OK.
Good luck.
I've coped with them already.
Wow, give me another.
Yeah, that's it...

Not bad. Not listen to the following. We've got a mole on the base, who's delivering the information to the side. And we don't have a clue of who he is. The only thing we know is that he's someone from the privates. Your task - look for him and find out, whom he is passing the information to. I think that after the today's turmoil he'll attempt to meet with the liaison. This mole is someone from the team sitting nearby the fire on the platform.\nAs soon as you define him, follow him stealthy. But be careful, so he won't see you, otherwise we'll find out nothing. When you discover who is he meeting with, act on your own disctretion, but be sure to report me on the results.
That means that I have a right to blow him away after the meeting?

That's right. I guess that he'll try to go on the meeting between 10 and 11 pm. It's rather dark in this time, so only few may see him, while the night mutants haven't poked out yet. Move, stalker. When you fulfill the task you can consider yourself to be the member of our grouping . Remember, the rat must be caught red-handed! That means that he has to be shot during the meeting, otherwise the task will be reckoned as failed one.
I'm telling you - visit Max.

So, the task is fulfilled. Not bad. Not listen to the following. We've got a mole on the base, who's delivering the information to the side. And we don't have a clue of who he is. The only thing we know is that he's someone from the privates. Your task - look for him and find out, whom he is passing the information to. I think that after the today's turmoil he'll attempt to meet with the liaison. This mole is someone from the team sitting nearby the fire on the platform.\nAs soon as you define him, follow him stealthy. But be careful, so he won't see you, otherwise we'll find out nothing. When you discover who is he meeting with, act on your own disctretion, but be sure to report me on the results.
That means that I have a right to blow him away after the meeting?

That's right. I guess that he'll try to go on the meeting between 10 and 11 pm. It's rather dark in this time, so only few may see him, while the night mutants haven't poked out yet. Move, stalker. When you fulfill the task you can consider yourself to be the member of our grouping . Remember, the rat must be caught red-handed! That means that he has to be shot during the meeting, otherwise the task will be reckoned as failed one.
Are you still here?
You're the man. Since now you are the member of "Freedom" grouping. Congratulations. Now you can rest on the base territory, when you want to, you can rely on our help.
Is there any other work?

If you feel the strength inside, you can go to the outpost at the entrance to Radar - according to several signs there is supposed to be the following attempt of mutants or Monolith break through. Guys may require help.
Well, you helped the guys at the Barrier, so take your time to rest.
Rest. No work for you yet.
Well, you've failed to accomplish the task. That's too bad. But you have another chance...
Which one?

According to several signs there is a probability of the following attempt of mutants or Monolith break through from the Radar. They will try to crowd the mutants in and then will try to break through themselves under the mutants cover. Guys may require help.
OK. I'm gone.
Okay. But if you leave till the end of the battle, don't even attempt to show yourself on the base...
Get on with it...
Well, then continue roaming - we don't need the help of such sissies.
Ты провалил задание и теперь этих документов нам не видать, как своих ушей. Нам не нужны такие неудачники.

Well, you've failed the task... That's too bad. But as you helped the guys at the Barrier, that's it - from now on you can consider yourself to be the member of Freedom grouping.\nCongratulations. Now you can chill out here within the base's territory when you want it, you can reckon on our help.
Is there any other work to do?
No, so far.
Lucash told me that you would suit well. Have you seen the fellas at the farm?
Нет.
Damn. Follow us.
Let's go.
Yeah.
Are there many of them?
I don't have a clue.
Человек шесть-восемь. Неплохо экипированы.
Go to Lucash.
Есть вопросы ?
Да. Лукаш поставил задачу - перехватить курьера "Долга" по пути с Радара в Мертвый город. Не поскажешь, где лучше это сделать ?

Хм. Лучше его перехватить до того, как он дойдет до хутора у прохода на Мертвый город. Там его явно будут ждать и ты вряд ли справишься. Да и через деревню идти надо будет, а там лучше не показываться. Двигай восточнее деревни и быстрее.
А что там в деревне ?
Поверь - ничего хорошего. Тварей много лазит, аномалий тоже хватает. Потом расскажу.
Тебя можно поздравить ?
Можно.
Can't you do a work for me?
What's my interest in it?
In exchange I'll suggest a place, where PG-6 can be obtained.
And what do I have to do?

Some guy is hiding at the swamp, he’s one of ours. He’s gone mad after visiting village and nobody can approach him now. Partly because he shoots at everyone in the field of vision, and partly because of the old minefield around his swamp. We are fed up with him, but you a smart fellow; you may succeed in stalking upon to him.
Why won't you go yourself?
Lucash has forbidden to poke around there - we haven't got too many guys at all.
Well, all right. I'm likely to visit the place...
Damn it, my life is much more valuable.
As you know...
Then good luck.
Heck with it.
Well, as you want...
Here's the flash-drive, I've obtained it from the madman.

Well, thank you, bro. As to the grenade launcher… In the village one of the buildings in the cellar there’s an RG6 and shells to it. But return before it gets dark - strange things happen there at night. I'll provide you the open sight to the PDA - you'll find it.
Oh, go on with ye... What knid of place you've picked up. Okay then.
Thanks again.
How are you doing?
Here is you flash-drive.
What, already?
What do you want to know?
Greetz, stalker! What have brought you here?
Business. Can you suggest whom shall I apply to?
To Lucash - he's the big B over here. Go to the main building.
Вижу, справился с задачей. Отдай Лукашу документы.
Tell me about the village.

Village? Loathsome place. It was formerly occupied by boars, dogs, fleshes, in general - small fry. We've been visiting it for the artifacts. Now only few know what's going on there. Bloodsukers appeared from nowhere, this is certain, well, it can be really fatal to poke nose there at night. Our last expedition has perished with its full complement, excluding one guy, who had his dome lost from then on.
What kind of area is this?
Everything for a little. Abandoned village, swamp, artifacts field... And what are you interested in?
Well, you've seen it with your eyes.
What kind of village?

Village? Loathsome place. It was formerly occupied by boars, dogs, fleshes, in general - small fry. We've been visiting it for the artifacts. Now only few know what's going on there. Bloodsukers appeared from nowhere, this is certain, well, it can be really fatal to poke nose there at night. Our last expedition has perished with its full complement, excluding one guy, who had his dome lost from then on.
Swamp? And what is within?

It has once been the lake, fish was found in the river, and now it's turned into the swamp. Not a childish radiation in there, none of the defenses helps. The last one who nosed around there died tormented for the dose received.
Why has he been nosing around the swamp?

One guy camps there, without any signs of noddle. Survivor from the village at night, then he lost his noddle. He's apparently a lucky person, as the soldiers has mined allmost everything in there, but he made his way to the house, and still occupies it, shooting off everything that comes nearby.
Artifacts ? Interesting. Where is it?
To the east from the base. But you ought to avoid that place as the pseudogiants have inhabited that place. They can attempt to have you on the lunch.
And where are these roads leading to?

They can get you to Rostok, byt perhaps it's where you've come from. Pass to Radar to the North, but there are few who travel there - nobody wants to finish their lives as the plant. The road to the east leads to the Dead city - mercenaries are there, they shoot everyone they see, however there is something to satisfy them with.
And where can I buy ammunition nearby, or the gun?
In the main building, on the ground floor, there is a Skinflint sitting to the left. He's in charge for the trading. You can even offer him artifacts.
Hi stalker! Feel like getting your adrenalin dose?
What do you mean?
You see, it's all about the place here.Monsters run, bullets whine, explosions, screams - kind of front line.
I thought only Freedom were guarding this line but here you come? So you are here for adrenalin sake only?

Well, yes and no. In fact we're waiting when something happens with this damn radiation or what a hell it is at Radar. We are the first to reach the promised land then. Plenty of artefacts and booty will provideprovide a worthy life when we retire.
So you came here for booty?

Sure. It's Kep and his "paladins" who's here for only for him comprehensible noble aims.And we? We are just ordinary guys, who want to live the way we do. Kep is not aware of our position but he's a clever man and understands that six extra guns won't do any bad. That's how the things are.
You are on Freedom's base, lad, so behave accordingly.
I do what i want to.

Dream on. If you fool around or if we hear a sound from you - you have only yourself to blame then. There was once a guy here - who's the man, i'm the man, i'll do you all in one go.....A slow-witted one in a word, so we got him walk naked across the minefield, we heard Skinflint srceaming when that chap's hand hit his head - you'd only hear... Clear ?
Got it, i'm not an idiot after all. And i've never dreamt of becoming a sapper.
Attaboy - get lost.
Ah, fresh meat.. Come here.
i don't quite understand?
Where to? Come on, stay - aboriginals ate Cook not just for fun, there's something in it.
I'M NOT TASTY!!! I suffered from various diseases when i was a child - jaundice, rachitis, haemorrhoids...
Damn, you should have mentioned this at once, just a waste of time....Eh, not tasty one. Get lost.
What is it you don't understand? Haven't you heard a slow-wittede-guy-history?
It's about fresh meat i don't really get.
Well, these starvation days, you see...
In what sense?
In strict one, hungry fighter - poor fighter. And we are so many here...
So?
Where can we get enough meat? And here you are just in time...
Eee....i'd better be going.
Well, what have you brought ?
Tхсх Єюую цх. +Єю Єхс ё¦фр яЁштхыю ?\n
¦Єю є трё ЄєЄ ёЄрЁ°шщ ? -хыю ъ эхьє хёЄ№.
TЄрЁ°шщ є эрё Tєър°, эрїюфшЄё т уыртэюь чфрэшш. =ю, ъюуфр т эхую тющфх°№ - ёяЁ ў№ юЁєцшх, р Єю ьюуєЄ ш яЁшёЄЁхышЄ№.\n
+хую Єръ ?
-р сvы яЁхЎхфхэЄ - Tєър°р ўєЄ№ сvыю эх уЁюїэєы ъръющ-Єю эрхьэшъ. T Єхї яюЁ ш яхЁхёЄЁрїютvтрхьё .
-ёэю.
Tрфэю, шфш.
-р Єръ ёхсх. =х ьх°рщ...
Hi !
Stop! Password?
South American Swallow!
Right! Pass in!
What kind of swamp is there in the nearby?

Radioactive pool. You'd better keep away from it, otherwise get X-rayed and you won't need a flashlight at night anymore. Some dude is hiding there and doesn't let anybody near, but anyway what fool will go there...
What dude ?
How a hell should i know. The say one of us, who was in the village.
What village ?
There's one not far from here. Full of mutants and anomalies. I've never been there, i'm staying on the base since recently. Ask Max - he's been long here.
Where can i buy bullets? It's a long way to "Rostok" and i'm not eager to go there at all.
Go to the main building. There on the ground floor you'll find what you need.
Stop!!
Stopped!
Password?
Bomopaglavibli.
What???
Bomopaglavibl.
Ne, wrong...
Talking horse?
Missed.
Wound, pshaw damn it. Enough of getting round. Any other variants?
Your turn.
Pip. Again, damn. You are such a swindler. Ok, i got it, so you don't know the password?
Will you give me a hint?
Dream on.
Let me in, you suggest my spending the night in the field?
Why not, the weather is fine - it's summer so to say. Ok, if you pass the test - may go in, fail - don't blame me.
Test?
Aha, three questions only that a real man must give answers to.
I'm not afraid, go on ask.
